generalSessions.name: Cheatham County General Sessions Court
generalSessions.address: Ashland City Courthouse, Ashland City, TN
judges: Contact court for current judge information
generalSessions.publicTransport: Limited public transit - check local routes

publicDefender.note: Available for indigent defendants in criminal traffic cases

clerk.name: Cheatham County Circuit Court Clerk
clerk.address: Ashland City Courthouse, Ashland City, TN

contestingTicket.deadline: Check citation for appearance deadline (typically 7-14 days)
process: Contact court clerk to enter not guilty plea
File discovery requests through court clerk

courtDates.scheduling: Court dates typically scheduled 4-6 weeks out
courtDates.continuances: Contact court clerk at least 48 hours before court date
courtDates.noShow: Failure to appear may result in bench warrant and license suspension

diversionProgram.name: Cheatham County Traffic Diversion Program
eligibility: No prior diversions in past 5 years
Violation not involving DUI, reckless driving, or accident with injury
requirements: Pay court costs and program fee

trafficSchool.deadline: Must complete within 90 days of court order

localRules.dressCode: Business casual recommended; no shorts, tank tops, or hats

specialConsiderations.speedCameras: Contact local court for current policy

legalAid.name: Legal Aid Society of Middle Tennessee
